name: Blocky Snake
description: Guide a snake to eat fruits and be the longest snake ever! Unlock skins, collect unique items, avoid other snakes and challenge your friends for the highest score!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: Dual Core 1.6GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 64mb graphics card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
